strings.string: Must Be Equal To
The response to "%1$s" must be equal to the response to question "%2$s"
The response to "%1$s" must be equal to "%2$s"
Response must be equal to the response to question "%s"
Response must be equal to "%s"
Must NOT Be Equal To
The response to "%1$s" must NOT be equal to the response to question "%2$s"
The response to "%1$s" must NOT be equal to "%2$s"
Response must NOT be equal to the response to question "%s"
Response must NOT be equal to "%s"
Must Be Greater Than
The response to "%1$s" must be greater than the response to question "%2$s"
The response to "%1$s" must be greater than "%2$s"
Response must be greater than the response to question "%s"
Response must be greater than "%s"
Must Be Less Than
The response to "%1$s" must be less than the response to question "%2$s"
The response to "%1$s" must be less than "%2$s"
Response must be less than the response to question "%s"
Response must be less than "%s"
Must Be Greater Than Or Equal To
The response to "%1$s" must be greater than or equal to the response to question "%2$s"
The response to "%1$s" must be greater than or equal to "%2$s"
Response must be greater than or equal to the response to question "%s"
Response must be greater than or equal to "%s"
Must Be Less Than Or Equal To
The response to "%1$s" must be less than or equal to the response to question "%2$s"
The response to "%1$s" must be less than or equal to "%2$s"
Response must be less than or equal to the response to question "%s"
Response must be less than or equal to "%s"
Question "%s" is a required field; it must be filled in
